d.en:
A shard which fell to the ground when
a comet approached.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.
d.cn:
A shard which fell to the ground when
a comet approached.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.
d.tw:
A shard which fell to the ground when
a comet approached.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.
d.de:
Ein Kometensplitter, der aus dem All
herabgefallen ist. Sammler geben ihr
letztes Hemd dafür.
d.fr:
Un fragment de comète, tombé au sol
quand elle traversait l'atmosphère.
Les amateurs en donnent un bon prix.
d.it:
Scheggia di cometa caduta al suolo.
Si può vendere a un prezzo piuttosto
alto agli intenditori.
d.es:
Fragmento de un cometa caído al
suelo al atravesar la atmósfera.
Muy valorado por los coleccionistas.
